metadata.title: North American West Coast Acoustic Doppler Current Profiler (ADCP) data, 1996-present
metadata.description: Acoustic Doppler Current Profiler data from many local and international locations. Largely experimental data collected in development of instrumentation. May be coordinated with other data collected, such as CTD, current meters, echo soundings, and meteorological buoys. Frequently collected in collaboration with other institutions.
keywords: South Inner Coast (Johnstone, Georgia, JDF, inlets and passages)
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Study of upper ocean processes, wave breaking, bubbles, turbulence

Supplemental Information: Risk Justification: Principal investigator has left DFO, but the data are secure. Data are in electronic format, well backed up and well documented.
Risk of Loss: Low
Impact Justification: Data used for one time analysis. Data from experiments or data generated from models.
Impact of Loss: Low
Recommended Action: None

Status: In work

Maintenance frequency: None planned

Access constraints: Private

Use constraints: Data may be proprietary or under collaborative agreements. Largely experimental data.

Distribution liability: [unknown]

Electronic Data Complications: Tapes will degrade with time, the hardware and software required to extract the data may become obsolete.
Lineage - Process steps:
  1. IOS and other collaborative institutions
